title: 跨团队对需求
situation: Another team says their system conflicts with your requirements. You propose a sync meeting.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 你们的需求跟我们系统有冲突。
turns.pinyin: Nǐmen de xūqiú gēn wǒmen xìtǒng yǒu chōngtú.
turns.translation: Your requirements conflict with our system.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 那我们约个会，一起对齐一下方案。
turns.pinyin: Nà wǒmen yuē ge huì, yīqǐ duìqí yīxià fāng'àn.
turns.translation: Let's set up a meeting to align on the approach.
suggestions: 那我们约个会，一起对齐一下方案。
约个会吧，当面对齐一下。

turns.speaker: partner
turns.translation: Who will join from your side?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 我和技术负责人，加上产品一起。
turns.pinyin: Wǒ hé jìshù fùzérén, jiā shàng chǎnpǐn yīqǐ.
turns.translation: Me, the tech lead, and product.
suggestions: 我和技术负责人，加上产品一起。
